ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: that he will then receive repayment of the fullest kind;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And only then will he receive his recompense in full;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and that he shall then be fully recompensed,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: and will be fully recompensed for his deeds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Then he will be fully repaid for it?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then he will be recompensed with a full and the best recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then shall he be rewarded for it with the fullest reward-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then he shall be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And afterward he will be repaid for it with fullest payment;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and in the end he will be repaid for it in full;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Thereafter he shall be recompensed therefor with the fullest recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: then he will be rewarded for it with the fullest reward;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then will he be rewarded with a reward complete;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then he will be recompensed with a full and the best recompense.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: then, he shall be recompensed for it in full repayment
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Then he will be rewarded for it the fullest reward.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then he will be recompensed for it with the fullest recompense
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:41] then he will be rewarded for it with the fullest reward, the most perfect [reward] (one may say jazaytuhu sa‘yahu or [jazaytuhu] bi-sa‘yihi [to mean the same thing]),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And afterward he will be repaid for it with fullest payment) good with good and evil with evil;
